articles.title: Japanese Reactionaries' Hysteric Anti-DPRK Racket Denounced
articles.content:
Japanese Reactionaries' Hysteric Anti-DPRK Racket Denounced
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Korea Asia-Pacific Peace Committee issued a statement Saturday over the fact that the Abe group of Japan kicked up a hysteric anti-DPRK racket, noisily trumpeting about the "story of nuclear threat from the north" and "solution to the abduction of Japanese" during the election of members of House of Representatives.
					 It is a trite trick used by the sinister and crafty Japanese reactionaries to kick up anti-DPRK smear campaign in order to mislead the public opinion and maintain their power whenever they are thrown into serious ruling crisis due to political inability and all kinds of corruptions and irregularities, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The recent farce of the election of members of the House of Representatives is also a product of the sinister plan of the Japanese reactionaries to tide over the political crisis caused by the corruption scandal of Abe and his family members, ensure the retrogressive revision of constitution opposed by the public at home and abroad and realize at any cost the militarist ambition.
					
					 The situation proves that the Abe group is the most wicked and sordid men who stoop to any infamy to achieve their political aim as they deceived the public by turning the whole Japanese archipelago into a theatre of the farce against the north.
					
					 It is a well-known fact that Abe and his group are using the "story about nuclear threat from the north" and "issue of abduction of Japanese" as excuses in order to push forward the constitutional revision which his predecessors failed to do, and then turn Japan into a "country which can participate in war" and realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere".
					
					 Abe and his group should know that they are playing a dangerous gamble by putting the prospect of their island country and the destiny of their people on stake.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries should clearly understand that the whole Japanese islands can bury into the bottom of the sea if they go reckless by acting a stooge in the U.S. racket for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and in its war moves while chiming in with old lunatic Trump's crazy remarks.

articles.title: Sepho Area Livestock Farming Base Completed in DPRK
articles.content:
Sepho Area Livestock Farming Base Completed in DPRK
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A livestock farming base has been successfully built in the Sepho area of the DPRK, under the Workers' Party of Korea's grand plan for harnessing nature.
					 It is the nation's leading large-scale livestock farming base which will be greatly conducive to the country's prosperity and the improvement of the people's livelihood.
					
					 Servicepersons and members of the Construction Shock Brigade 922 turned the barren land in Sepho area, abandoned for thousands of years, into a socialist land in less than five years.
					
					 Tens of thousands of hectares of grassland were created and shelter belts, forests for protection of grassland, grazing roads, drainage canals and reservoirs formed in vast area including Sepho, Phyonggang and Ichon counties. After all, a modern and scientific livestock big farming base has taken its shape with such structures as thousands of dwelling houses, public buildings and animal sheds which a integrated production system and a veterinary and anti-epizootic system were established, veterinary and anti-epizootic facilities and livestock production processing bases and thus, material and technical foundations have been provided to smoothly carry out the Party's policy of livestock farming.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony of the livestock farming base took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, Pak Thae Dok, vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, Ko In Ho, vice-premier and minister of Agriculture, Pak Jong Nam, chairman of the Kangwon Provincial Committee of the WPK, officials of ministries, national institutions and local party and power organs, servicepersons and shock brigade members who took part in the construction, and working people in Kangwon Province.
					
					 Pak Pong Ju said at the ceremony that the conversion of Sepho area into a big livestock farming base which will be greatly helpful to the improvement of the people's standard of living is another great auspicious event in the era of the WPK in which a long-cherished desire of the Korean people to enjoy a rich and happy life comes true.
					
					 He stressed the need to set in a proper way the goal and plan for keeping the production at the livestock farming base on a high level and normal basis so that the Party's love and benevolence can be reached to the people in actuality.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants toured various parts of the base after being briefed on it.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Inspects Paekam Farm in Sukchon County
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Inspects Paekam Farm in Sukchon County
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, made a field survey of threshing at Paekam Farm in Sukchon County, South Phyongan Province.
					 He, going round the farm, stressed the need to finish threshing in quality and discussed the issue of fully supplying electricity needed for threshing.
					
					 Earlier, he learned about the remodeling of the Institute of Pomiculture of the Academy of Agricultural Science and took steps to provide building materials in good time for the project going at its final stage.

articles.title: Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes
articles.content:
Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest Closes
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The 2017 Inter-provincial Mass Sports Contest closed on Saturday.
					 There were finals of various events at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium that day.
					
					 Among the spectators were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK who is chairman of the National Sports Guidance Committee, Choe Hui, vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Vice Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Jon Yong Nam, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, officials concerned, participants of the contest and Pyongyangites.
					
					 The Pyongyang City Team won the female volleyball and tug-of-war. The North Hwanghae Provincial Team and the Kwangwon Provincial Team respectively won the hurdle race and running with balls in arms and over heads while dribbling.
					
					 There was a demonstration by the Taekwondo Team of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee.
					
					 Pyongyang City took the first place in total standings.
					
					 Then, there was a closing ceremony.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Alma Mater, Changdok School
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Alma Mater, Changdok School
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Changdok School in Pyongyang, the DPRK is the alma mater closely associated with the revolutionary life of President Kim Il Sung.
					 It was built by the pioneers of Chilgol area, including his maternal grandfather Kang Ton Uk, when the patriotic enlightenment movement swept the whole country after the "annexation of Korea by Japan" early in 20th century.
					
					 Regarding as a motto his father Kim Hyong Jik's instruction that a Korean must be well versed in his or her country to win back its independence from the Japanese imperialists, the President made the 1 000-ri (250 mile) journey for learning Korea and attended the school from April Juche 12 (1923) to January Juche 14 (1925).
					
					 In his schooldays, the President worked hard to learn the mother tongue, history and geography of Korea and was determined to restore its independence while witnessing its gloomy realities and miserable life of its people.
					
					 When visiting the school on October 28, 1945 after the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule, he recalled with deep emotion that his days at Changdok School was a significant occasion in his life and the patriotic soul he fostered during the schooldays instilled him a firm confidence and indomitable fighting spirit during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. And he indicated the way ahead of the school.
					
					 Now, the school has developed into a model school of the country which has produced many talented students, including International Math Olympiads champions and winners of the July 15 Honor Student Prize.
					
					 And a number of achievements have been made in its educational work, so that its students have proved successful at different national school contests every year.

articles.title: Mendicant Diplomacy Will Bring Nothing but Derision and Ill Fame: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Mendicant Diplomacy Will Bring Nothing but Derision and Ill Fame: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The puppet Foreign Ministry and Unification Ministry of south Korea are working hard to elicit "international cooperation for sanctions and pressure" on the DPRK.
					 Foreign Minister Kang Kyong Hwa during her visit to Belgium and France met their foreign ministers and the high representative of the European Union for Foreign Affairs and Security Policy where she cried out for "taking the north to the negotiations for denuclearization through concerted sanctions and pressure by the international community" and requested for "sanctions and pressure on the north".
					
					 Meanwhile, Unification Minister Jo Myong Gyun at international conferences like "2017 Korean Peninsula International Forum" asked the countries around the world to take an active part in putting sanctions and pressure on the DPRK, claiming "the north's nuclear issue has become an outstanding issue concerned by the whole world" and "the north's nuclear issue must be solved through close international cooperation based on strong security".
					
					 This is the last-ditch effort of the U.S.-reared rabid dogs taken aback by the tremendous might of the DPRK's state nuclear force.
					
					 Stooges have to follow in the footsteps of their masters, regardless of their war moves or sanctions and pressure, while chiming in with them.
					
					 Not only the international community but Americans are critical of the U.S., saying that "sanctions will not work" and "sanctions are not the way of settling the issue". Even the chairman of the U.S. Senate Foreign Relations Committee holds that Trump has to take his hands off the north Korean issue.
					
					 The south Koreans held up candlelight again, contending that "nothing fundamental has changed except president and ministers after the candlelight demonstrations" as they pursue the hostile policy toward the DPRK of Trump who said that "even if a war breaks out, it will be fought on the Korean peninsula and even though thousands are killed, they will be there." 
					
					 The situation of the puppet forces gets all the more deplorable as they are trying hard to curry favor with their mad master, without any clear principle or sense of judging the situation.
					
					 The puppet forces ask for "putting sanctions and pressure" here and there, even though they are derided as Trump's poodle dog, far from being sympathized by the world people. This reminds one of the despicable appearance of a beggar.
					
					 The dogs filial to the U.S. begged for support for stifling the fellow countrymen only to get derision, insult and cold-shoulder.
					
					 The puppet forces seized by sycophancy toward the U.S. and confrontation with the fellow countrymen should clearly understand that it is little short of trying to empty the sea to attempt to bring down the DPRK through "sanctions and pressure".
					
					 They will only get the ill-fame of modern-day traitor of 1905 if they go reckless to prolong their remaining days through sycophancy and treachery, while failing to understand what guarantees peace and security of the Korean peninsula and what the fundamental interests of the nation is.
					
					 The coteries of the south Korean puppet Foreign Ministry and Unification Ministry had better not run amuck, if they do not want to face the same miserable fate as Yun Pyong Se and Hong Yong Phyo who were thrown into the garbage ground of history together with traitor Park Geun Hye for their frantic moves for imposing sanctions and pressure on the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK Will Keep to Its Path: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Will Keep to Its Path: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will dynamically advance on the road of triumph, firmly preserving its independent line in any storm and stress, no matter how desperately the enemies move to check it, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is running wild in a bid to hold in check the advance of the DPRK for perfecting its state nuclear force.
					
					 The DPRK had access to its self-defensive nuclear deterrent and has bolstered it up rapidly by tightening its belt in order to put a definite end to the U.S. imperialists' outrageous nuclear threat and blackmail and pave an avenue to independent development and eternal prosperity.
					
					 The nuclear force of the DPRK has become a strong deterrent for firmly protecting peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia and creditably guaranteeing the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development of the Korean nation.
					
					 But for that nuclear deterrent, the U.S. might have provoked a war on the peninsula to make the Korean nation fall victim to a terrible nuclear disaster. It was proven by the tragic situation of the war-torn non-nuclear countries which became the targets of invasion and plunder by the U.S.
					
					 It is ridiculous for the U.S. to try to browbeat the DPRK through such muscle-flexing as deploying nuclear aircraft carriers and submarines near the Korean peninsula and its vicinity and flying nuclear-capable strategic bombers on it.
					
					 The U.S. and its followers' crazy escalation of sanctions, pressure and military threats to the DPRK will only get them nowhere.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Servile Diplomacy
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Servile Diplomacy
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The puppet regime of south Korea held a consultation of chief negotiators to the six party talks and a consultation of vice foreign ministers with their masters U.S. and Japan. There they asked the U.S. and Japan to "deter the north's provocation" and help them attain the "goal of denuclearization", claiming "the north's nuclear and missile threats have reached a serious level."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 The puppet regime should think twice about what phase the DPRK-U.S. nuclear confrontation has reached and what terrible results will be produced by their reckless act of depending on the U.S. and Japan if it has not lost its sense of reality and ability to judge the situation.
					
					 Now is just the crucial time for the regime to behave itself, facing up to the changed strategic position of the DPRK and the trend of the times.
					
					 The regime's servile diplomacy for "soliciting foreign cooperation in pressurizing the north" is just a petty trick to resume the worn-out six-party talks. It is also an unpardonable act of treachery to do harm to the compatriots at any cost with the backing of outsiders.
					
					 The puppet regime is going so foolish as to flatter the U.S., "thanking it for its resolute counteraction." It is now crazily beating the drum of confrontation, trumpeting about "new-level pressure," not content with offering the whole of south Korea to the U.S. for its north-targeted war drills.
					
					 The north-south relations are deteriorating as the days go by and a touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula. This is a product of the hideous acts of treachery of the puppet regime which has run wild to realize its wild dream for depriving the DPRK of its nukes in league with the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Explicitly speaking once again, no force can ever check the strenuous advance of the DPRK along the road of simultaneously developing the two fronts, demonstrating its dignity as a nuclear power.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Derides Trump in Dilemma
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Derides Trump in Dilemma
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- When interviewed recently by media ahead of his junkets to south Korea and some other Asian countries, Trump said that the U.S. is in "unbelievably full readiness" against "north Korea's provocation" and one will be "greatly shocked" by that full readiness. He also asserted the U.S. "appreciates and encourages a north Korea's neighbor" in its participation in "slapping sanctions against it," terming the relations with that country "extremely exceptional and very good" as that country is "sincerely helping the U.S."
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday says:
					
					 What Trump uttered only betrayed his poor image as a spineless politician in dilemma.
					
					 As shown by the situation, the Trump administration is leaving no obstructive means untried, exasperated by the DPRK's rapid bolstering of its self-defensive nuclear force.
					
					 It recently deployed its strategic assets massively including nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups in the waters off the Korean peninsula and kicked off a war rehearsal against the DPRK, but it was useless.
					
					 The same can be said of its sanctions racket against the DPRK. Trump is going busy, hyping "toughest sanctions" but it has also proven ineffective against the DPRK's strong spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 Bluffing is peculiar to half-wits.
					
					 The DPRK has already attained its final goal in its great cause of building the state nuclear force. What remains to be done is to demonstrate the mettle of Juche Korea to frustrate the U.S. futile moves and bring peace to the world. The U.S. should clearly understand this.

articles.title: S. Koreans Launch Actions for Combating Evils of Intelligence Organ
articles.content:
S. Koreans Launch Actions for Combating Evils of Intelligence Organ
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- South Koreans of various circles launched actions to combat the evils of the Intelligence Service, according to the south Korean newspaper Nodong and Segye.
					 Figures of political and social circles and those of civic and social organizations and other citizens formed a group for stopping surveillance on citizens and reforming the IS and held a press conference outside the Sejong Cultural Hall on Oct. 24.
					
					 Speakers at the conference called on the public to join the campaign for rooting out the evils of the IS.

articles.title: S. Korean Civic Organizations Form Anti-War Peace Action
articles.content:
S. Korean Civic Organizations Form Anti-War Peace Action
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- 82 civic organizations in North Jolla Province of south Korea formed a Jonbuk action for peaceful reunification of the Korean Peninsula against war on Oct. 26, according to the south Korean Newsis.
					 On the same day, the action held a press conference on its formation at the North Jolla Provincial Office, at which it denounced the authorities for actively joining in Trump's hysteria to ignite a war.
					
					 It demanded that the U.S. halt the hostile policy toward the DPRK, replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace accord and stop selling war weapons by increasing the military tension on the peninsula.

articles.title: S. Koreans Launch No-Trump Actions
articles.content:
S. Koreans Launch No-Trump Actions
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- 220-odd political parties and organizations of south Korea including the People's Party, the People's Democratic Party, the People's Action for Peace against War and the Confederation of Trade Unions reportedly formed the No-Trump Joint Action on Oct. 28 and launched a solidarity struggle, according to media reports.
					 The Joint Action held a press conference on the formation in Seoul and made public its action plan that day.
					
					 Speakers at the conference took out their rage, saying that the tense situation on the Korean peninsula would get sharper with Trump's visit as an occasion
					
					 They called on the public to turn out in the campaign for blocking the Trump's planned visit to south Korea.
					
					 Noting Trump is not entitled to set his feet on the south Korean land, they urged him to promise to apologize for his reckless remarks at once and not to ignite a war.
					
					 Then, the organization made public an action-launching declaration.
					
					 The Joint Action is about to launch diverse actions as it set the period from October 30 to November 8 as a No-Trump action week.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Inflaming Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed for Inflaming Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Anti-Trump and Anti-U.S. Struggle Headquarters of south Korea held a rally in South Jolla Province to blast the U.S. and south Korean puppet authorities for their war drills targeting the north and condemn warmonger Trump on Oct. 26, according to the south Korean online paper Minjok Ilbo.
					 Speakers at the rally charged that the U.S. has introduced all kinds of nuclear strategic assets into the Korean peninsula to realize its goals.
					
					 They urged the present "government" to come out for national cooperation, not for sanctions and confrontation with the north.
					
					 A statement was issued at the rally.
					
					 The statement branded the U.S. nuclear assets as war tools threatening the existence of the Korean nation and called on everyone to turn out in the struggle against Trump and nuclear war drills targeting the north.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Moves of U.S. and Its Followers under Fire
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Moves of U.S. and Its Followers under Fire
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the General Association of Koreans in China on Oct. 23 made public a statement titled "We bitterly denounce the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces against the DPRK".
					 The statement charged that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet war mongers frantically kicked up war drills against the DPRK in the sky, land and seas of south Korea, driving the situation of the Korean peninsula to the touch-and-go tension, blaming the DPRK's bolstering of the nuclear deterrence for self-defence as "provocations" and "nuclear threat".
					
					 Stating that the present south Korean authorities zealously follow the U.S. moves of sanctions against the DPRK under the signboard of "strengthening of alliance", selling out the dignity and interests of the nation through the confrontation racket with the compatriots and vociferating about priority to outside forces and cooperation with outside forces, not national cooperation, the statement went on:
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. imperialists may try, claiming "sanctions and retaliatory punishment," the DPRK will never be frightened. The DPRK has always won victory in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The arrogant Trump administration should stop the war provocation moves and hostile policy toward the DPRK, though belatedly, clearly understanding that if they ignite a war on the Korean peninsula, the whole land of the U.S. would reduce to ashes so that there would be no one left to sign a surrender document.
					
					 The south Korean authorities should reasonably depend on the nation and take the option to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will more vigorously turn out in the patriotic struggle to open up the avenue to independent reunification after driving the U.S. forces out of south Korea at an early date and resolutely smashing the sanctions and war moves of the U.S. imperialists and warlike forces at home and abroad.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Report to WPK Seventh Congress Off Press in Algeria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Report to WPK Seventh Congress Off Press in Algeria
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- The Tarzalt Publishing House in El-Djezair of Algeria brought out in booklet "3. For Independent Reunification of Country" and "4. For Global Independence" of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's report to the Seventh Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea on the work of the Central Committee on Oct. 18 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the WPK, its 72nd birthday and the 91st anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union.

articles.title: October Holidays of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
October Holidays of DPRK Celebrated Abroad
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Pakistan, Britain and Peru between Oct. 8 and 11 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 The secretary general of the Karachi Branch of the Pakistan-Korea Friendship Association said it was thanks to the wise guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il that the WPK could demonstrate its might as an invincible party.
					
					 The chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy said that the feats of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il for the foundation and development of the WPK can be keenly felt through the praiseworthy successes made by the Korean people in socialist construction, adding that although the move of the imperialists to stifle the DPRK goes vicious day by day, socialist Korea advancing under the guidance of the WPK will win victory after victory.
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Community Party of Peru said it is thanks to the distinguished and seasoned guidance of the great leader and the great party that the Korean people have made epochal changes in all fields, firmly defending the dignity and sovereignty of the country and socialism from all sorts of pressure and sanctions by the U.S.
					
					 Congratulatory message and letter to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the celebrations in Pakistan and Britain.

articles.title: Commemorative Lectures Given in Various Countries
articles.content:
Commemorative Lectures Given in Various Countries
Pyongyang, October 28 (KCNA) -- Lecture meetings were held in Guinea, Angola, Austria and Romania between Sept. 28 and Oct. 10 to mark the 20th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and its 72nd birthday.
					 Attending them were personages of different social standings and citizens of those countries.
					
					 The deputy director general of the Kim Il Sung Institute of Agricultural Science in Guinea explained the essential content of the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung, saying it is the guiding idea of the WPK.
					
					 The chief and members of the Youth Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism in Vienna mentioned Kim Il Sung's feats for party-building and the historic significance of the foundation of the WPK.
					
					 The chairman of the Romanian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea noted that Kim Jong Il turned the WPK into the party of the leader and a guiding force of the Songun revolution and defended the destiny of the country and nation, holding high the banner of Songun in the period of unprecedentedly stern ordeals.

articles.title: Portavoz del CCPAP denuncia la histerica campana anti-RPDC de Japon
articles.content:
Portavoz del CCPAP denuncia la histerica campana anti-RPDC de Japon
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Durante las elecciones de la Camara de Representantes de Japon, la banda de Abe escenifico nuevamente la histerica campana conflictiva contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea formando griteria sobre el "rumor de amenaza nuclear del Norte" y la solucion del "problema de japoneses secuestrados". 
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico (CCPAP) hizo publica el dia 28 una declaracion que sigue:
					
					Cada vez que caen en la grave crisis de dominacion por su incapacidad politica y actos de irregularidades y corrupcion, los taimados reaccionarios japoneses utilizan su metodo rutinario de armar la campana intrigante anti-RPDC con el fin de enganar a la opinion publica interna y externa y mantener asi el poder. 
					
					Las recientes elecciones de representantes tambien resultan un producto del complot de ellos de salir de la crisis politica causada por el escandalo de Abe y sus familiares y enmendar la Constitucion para realizar a toda costa la ambicion militarista rechazada por los nacionales y extranjeros. 
					
					La realidad demuestra que la banda de Abe, que convirtio todo el archipielago japones en el escenario de "oleada anti-Norte" y engano a la opinion publica, es la horda de especuladores mas astutos y sucios que no reparan en nada para realizar sus ambiciones politicas.
					
					Es conocido por todo el mundo que Abe y sus seguidores pretextan la "amenaza nuclear del Norte" y el "problema de secuestro" para lograr la enmienda de la Constitucion, tarea incumplida por los gobernantes antecesores, con el designio de convertir a Japon en el "pais que puede hacer la guerra" y poner en practica el sueno de la "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".
					
					Pero, ellos deben conocer que eso es la jugada al azar que arriesga el futuro de su pais y el destino de su pueblo. 
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses deben tener presente que puede hundirse en el mar todo el archipielago japones si ellos se ofrecen como ejecutores materiales de la campana conflictiva y las maniobras belicas anti-RPDC de EE.UU. poniendose de acuerdo con el discurso violento del vejete loco Trump.

articles.title: Tiene lugar ceremonia de inauguracion de base ganadera de la zona de Sepho
articles.content:
Tiene lugar ceremonia de inauguracion de base ganadera de la zona de Sepho
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Quedo construida excelentemente la base ganadera de la zona de Sepho.
					Esta base de ganaderia construida segun el proyecto del Partido del Trabajo de Corea sobre la gran transformacion de la naturaleza contribuira mucho a la prosperidad de la patria y la mejora de la vida de la poblacion. 
					
					Los constructores militares y los miembros de la Brigada de Construccion 922 convirtieron en menos de 5 anos esa tierra esteril, abandonada durante varios milenios, en paraiso socialista que abarca los distritos de Sepho, Phyonggang e Ichon. 
					
					Se han creado los herbazales de decenas de miles de hectareas, los rompevientos, los bosques vedados, las carreteras de pastoreo, el canal de desague y los depositos de agua.
					
					Se edificaron miles de viviendas y edificios publicos, los corrales donde operan el sistema de produccion integral y el de prevencion veterinaria, los establecimientos de prevencion veterinaria, la base de procesamiento de productos pecuarios y otros. 
					
					La ceremonia de inauguracion tuvo lugar el dia 27.
					
					Asistieron a la ocasion Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Pak Thae Dok, vicepresidente del Comite Central del PTC, Ko In Ho, vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, Pak Jong Nam, presidente del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Kangwon, los funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales y organizaciones del partido y el poder en las localidades, los constructores militares, los miembros de las brigadas de choque y los trabajadores de la provincia de Kangwon. 
					
					Al pronunciar el discurso inaugural, Pak Pong Ju dijo que la zona de Sepho se ha convertido ahora en una gran base ganadera y que este acontecimiento jubiloso de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo hace realidad el deseo secular del pueblo coreano de llevar una vida feliz y acomodada. 
					
					Dijo que los funcionarios y empleados del Comite de Administracion Ganadera de la Zona de Sepho y de los comites de administracion ganadera de los distritos de Sepho, Phyonggang e Ichon deben trazar la meta de normalizar en alto nivel la produccion de la base ganadera y organizar con escrupulosidad los trabajos economicos para que las benevolencias del partido alcancen a los habitantes. 
					
					Terminada la ceremonia, los participantes escucharon las explicaciones generales sobre la base ganadera y recorrieron varios puntos.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju visita la Granja de Paekam
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju visita la Granja de Paekam
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, vicepresidente del Comite de Estado y primer ministro de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, averiguo en el terreno como marcha la trilladura en la Granja de Paekam del distrito de Sukchon de la provincia de Phyong-an del Sur.
					El premier dio enfasis en la necesidad de acelerar con calidad la trilladura y discutio los problemas para suministrar suficiente electricidad para esa faena agricola. 
					
					Con anterioridad, hizo conocimiento de la reconstruccion en etapa final del Centro de Fruticultura del Instituto de Agricultura y tomo las medidas para enviar a tiempo los materiales de acabado.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la diplomacia surcoreana que busca afrenta y oprobio
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la diplomacia surcoreana que busca afrenta y oprobio
Pyongyang, 28 de octubre (ACNC) -- Ultimamente, los cabecillas de los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores y de Unificacion del Sur de Corea andan con ajetreo para conseguir la "cooperacion internacional en sancionar y presionar" a la RPDC.
					Durante su visita a Belgica y Francia, la cancillera surcoreana Kang Kyong Hwa se reunio con sus homologos de esos paises europeos y con el alto representante encargado de asuntos exteriores y politica de seguridad de la Union Europea.
					
					En esos encuentros, ella les suplico la "sancion y presion sobre el Norte (de Corea)" diciendo que hay que llevar al Norte a la mesa de negociaciones por la desnuclearizacion mediante la escalada de sancion y presion unidas de la sociedad internacional.
					
					Por su parte, el ministro de Unificacion, Jo Myong Gyun, dijo en el "Forum Internacional de la Peninsula Coreana de 2017" y otras reuniones internacionales que "el problema nuclear del Norte se hizo el tema que preocupa a todo el mundo" y "debe ser resuelto a traves de la estrecha cooperacion internacional basada en la fuerte seguridad". Para colmo, solicito que todos los paises del mundo se sumen activamente a la sancion y presion anti-RPDC.
					
					Este hecho deja conocer que esos perros rabiosos proyanquis estan desesperados para impedir el crecimiento del poderio de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la RPDC.
					
					Es muy miserable la situacion de los lacayos surcoreanos que deben seguir a ciegas a EE.UU. en todo lo que sea, los ejercicios de guerra o la sancion y presion.
					
					Ahora, tanto en la sociedad internacional como en el interior de EE.UU. se oyen las voces criticas de que "la sancion no sirve ni es la solucion del problema".
					
					Hasta el presidente del comite de asuntos diplomaticos del Senado de EE.UU. insiste en que Trump debe sacar la mano del problema norcoreano.
					
					Descontenta con la conducta de las autoridades que se suman a la politica hostil anti-RPDC de Trump quien habia dicho que "la guerra se desatara en la Peninsula Coreana y aunque mueran miles de personas, eso sucedera tambien ahi", la poblacion surcoreana volvio a levantar las velas opinando que "despues de la resistencia con velas encendidas, se cambiaron el presidente y los ministros, pero no hubo cambios radicales".
					
					Aunque son burlados por todo el mundo como "perros mimados de Trump", los titeres surcoreanos no dejan de suplicar la "sancion y presion anti-Norte".
					
					Ellos deben conocer que es un sueno nunca realizable su idea de poner de rodillas a la RPDC mediante la "sancion y presion".
					
					Si siguen actuando como ahora sin conocer donde esta la garantia de la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y cuales son los intereses fundamentales de la nacion, no se ganaran otra cosa que la deshonra de "5 Traidores de Ulsa" de version moderna.
					
					Si no quieren repetir el antecedente tragico de Yun Pyong Se y Hong Yong Phyo, quienes habian sido criticados duro junto con su patrona Park Geun-hye por su fanatica campana de sancion y presion anti-RPDC, las autoridades de los Ministerios de Relaciones Exteriores y de Unificacion deben actuar con prudencia.
